articles.author: Simone Giuliani
articles.title: Dwars door Vlaanderen crash update – Surgery for Van Aert, Stuyven and Kirsch - Cyclingnews
articles.description: Crash impacts riders and teams ahead of Sunday's Tour of Flanders
articles.content: The mournful cries of Wout Van Aert after the Dwars door Vlaanderen crash were accompanied by the brutal vision of a number of riders and bikes scattered across the road, with ripped jerseys and the … [+6260 chars]
